abstract_summ: This commentary presents a novel outlook for public health authorities in the affected countries to detect and respond quickly to the emerging public health threats such as Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).Some of these challenges are related to the possible adverse effects of SARS-CoV-2 on male reproductive health, and whether other potential modes of transmission may occur, such as sexual transmission.This paper focused on its potential risks on reproductive health, including reproductive system and function, as well as gamete and embryo development, which was underpinned by the virus, drugs, chemical disinfectants and panic psychology during the outbreak of COVID-19.Early identification of imported cases, prevention of family clustering transmission, preventive measures in the public area and strict infection control procedure in hospitals were crucial for successful prevention of COVID-19 in Shenzhen, China.Such a public health emergency can greatly impact various aspects of people's health and lives.
title_summ: The influence of preventive strategies on COVID-2019 epidemic in Shenzhen, ChinaSyndromic Surveillance System for MERS-CoV as New Early Warning and Identification ApproachPotential risks of SARS-Cov-2 infection on reproductive healthSARS-COV-2 and Male Reproductive Health.
title_abstract_phrases: Syndromic Surveillance System for MERS-CoV as New Early Warning and Identification ApproachThis commentary presents a novel outlook for public health authorities in the affected countries to detect and respond quickly to the emerging public health threats such as Middle East respiratory syndrome coronavirus (MERS-CoV).Some of these challenges are related to the possible adverse effects of SARS-CoV-2 on male reproductive health, and whether other potential modes of transmission may occur, such as sexual transmission.This paper focused on its potential risks on reproductive health, including reproductive system and function, as well as gamete and embryo development, which was underpinned by the virus, drugs, chemical disinfectants and panic psychology during the outbreak of COVID-19.The influence of preventive strategies on COVID-2019 epidemic in Shenzhen, ChinaEarly identification of imported cases, prevention of family clustering transmission, preventive measures in the public area and strict infection control procedure in hospitals were crucial for successful prevention of COVID-19 in Shenzhen, China.Implementing an innovative electronic surveillance system called syndromic surveillance system is essential for global health security.
